title: TVS Motor Company strengthens Central American presence by partnering with Grupo Q for Nicaragua and Costa Rica
description: Active Motors SA will support TVS Motor with dedicated sales, service, spares and customer relationship management (CRM). As part of this association, Active SA Motors will facilitate the opening of three flagship outlets and about 50 dealerships for TVS Motor Company in a phase-wise manner across Nicaragua and Costa Rica.
